name: > Get Links
description: This PB will get links on the basis of Source and Destination IP

arguments.name: Nozomi Networks Central Management Console

params.query: | where appliance_host == {{vars.sourceData['appliance_host']}} | where from == {{vars.input.params.alertData['sourceIp']}} OR to == {{vars.input.params.alertData['sourceIp']}}

message.content:
Correlated following Links fetch from Nozomi as an Event for Alert's Source IP {{vars.input.params.alertData['sourceIp']}} and Destination IP {{vars.input.params.alertData['destinationIp']}}

{% for item in vars.steps.Create_Event %}{{loop.index}}: {{item.name}}
{% endfor %}

resource.name: Communication from {{vars.item.from}} to {{vars.item.to}}
resource.description:
From {{vars.item.from}}
To {{vars.item.to}}
Is From Public {{vars.item.is_from_public}}
Is To Public {{vars.item.is_to_public}}
Protocol {{vars.item.protocol}}
From Zone {{vars.item.from_zone}}
To Zone {{vars.item.to_zone}}
First Activity Time {{arrow.get(vars.item.first_activity_time | int).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}
Last Activity Time {{arrow.get(vars.item.last_activity_time | int).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}

arguments.name: Nozomi Networks Central Management Console

params.query: | where appliance_host == {{vars.sourceData['appliance_host']}} | where from == {{vars.input.params.alertData['destinationIp']}} OR to == {{vars.input.params.alertData['destinationIp']}}
